summary: AFTER DRIVING APPROX. 1/2 MILE ON A VERY BUSY CITY STREET AT MORNING RUSH HOUR, GOING APPROX 35 MPH, I STARTED COASTING DOWNHILL.  SCREEN INDICATED HIGH ENGINE TEMPERATURE, ENGINE IMMEDIATELY STARTED TO STALL MAKING IT HARD TO MANEUVER THE VEHICLE. MESSAGE INDICATED TO PULL OVER & SHUT OFF ENGINE.  TEMP GAUGE WAS ALL THE WAY IN THE RED.  HAD VEHICLE TOWED TO DEALERSHIP FOR DIAGNOSTIC.
